attributes.action: Iain Duncan Smith say's he can live on £53 per week - prove it
attributes.additional_details:
Iain Duncan Smith say's he can live on £53 per week - prove it.

On the birth of the new NHS and the reduced benefits system, Ian Duncan Smith announced he can live on £53 if he had to.  This is a petition to make him do so under the supervision of an established Comic Relief project in the UK.

If he can,and Comic Relief validate it, live on.  If he can't he should resign.
